title: ‘The Challenge: Spies, Lies, and Allies’ Episode 12 (500th Episode!) With Leroy | Death, Taxes, and Bananas
description:
Johnny celebrates the 500th episode of ‘The Challenge’ with his longtime friend and accomplice, Leroy. They discuss CT’s manipulative strategies throughout his long tenure on the show and in this season with Emy (0:25) and why Josh is one of their favorite contestants right now (30:35). Then they take a walk down memory lane and talk about their friendship on the show and their favorite stories from their time together on ‘The Challenge’ (32:30). 
Host: Johnny Bananas
Guest: Leroy Garrett
Associate Producer: Sasha Ashall
Additional Production: Juliet Litman
